resources.string: Enter in either of the field

Measurement Converter	
The best unit converter app with a simple UI.


Discover the converter list
 with 7 unit Conversations.

This app is the simple way to 
quickly convert between a variety of units.


This application was made as a part of 
Google student Ambassador program.

 
Thanks to Mr. Tejas Koundinya and Mr. Pavan Kumar 
(The Google Student Ambassadors K.S.I.T Bangalore)
for giving this opportunity and for their help and support.
